methods.name: goal.list
methods.description: List personal goals for the authenticated user. Goals are private and scoped to each user.

spaceId.description: Optional space ID to filter goals

goals.description: Array of goals belonging to the user

methods.name: goal.create
methods.description: Create a new personal goal. Goals help track objectives across short, mid, and long-term horizons.

spaceId.description: Optional space ID to associate goal with

horizon.description: Goal horizon: short, mid, or long

keywords.description: Keywords for matching tasks to this goal

methods.name: goal.update
methods.description: Update a personal goal. Only the goal owner can update their goals.

horizon.description: New horizon: short, mid, or long

errors.message: You can only update your own goals

methods.name: goal.delete
methods.description: Delete a personal goal. Only the goal owner can delete their goals.

errors.message: You can only delete your own goals

methods.name: goal.assignTask
methods.description: Link a task to a goal. This helps track which tasks contribute to achieving a goal.

methods.name: goal.unassignTask
methods.description: Unlink a task from a goal.

methods.name: goal.byTask
methods.description: Get goals linked to a specific task. Only returns goals owned by the authenticated user.

methods.name: goal.match
methods.description: Find goals matching text by keywords. Useful for suggesting goal links when creating tasks.

text.description: Text to match against goal keywords

spaceId.description: Optional space ID to filter goals

methods.name: profile.distill
methods.description: Generate or refresh behavioral profile from activity patterns. Returns trait scores, patterns, strengths, and recommendations.

spaceId.description: Optional space ID to scope analysis

methods.name: profile.get
methods.description: Get current behavioral profile without regenerating. Returns the most recent profile snapshot.

methods.name: review.ensurePage
methods.description: Create or fetch weekly review page for current week. Includes GTD checklist sections.

errors.message: Cannot create pages in this space

methods.name: review.createPrompts
methods.description: Create review questions for reflection during weekly review.

methods.name: review.listPending
methods.description: List pending review prompts for the current week that haven't been addressed.

methods.name: insights.generateSummary
methods.description: Generate AI summary of space activity (daily, weekly, or monthly).

period.description: Summary period: daily, weekly, or monthly

methods.name: insights.graph
methods.description: Get memory/entity relationship graph showing connections between mentioned entities.

methods.name: insights.entityMemories
methods.description: Get memories related to a specific entity.

methods.name: insights.entityDetails
methods.description: Get detailed information about an entity including related memories.

methods.name: insights.topEntities
methods.description: List the most frequently mentioned entities in your memories.
